title.rendered: Men`s WhiteGray Champ Drive Flash Hybrid Full-Zip Jacket

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483449927419{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Keep the cold air at bay while you celebrate your beloved California Splashes with this incredible Champ Drive Flash Hybrid full-zip jacket from Splashes![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 100% Polyester
  • Dri-FIT ® technology wicks away moisture
  • Lightweight jacket suitable for mild temperatures
  • Zipper pocket on left chest
  • Full Zip

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Machine wash, tumble dry low
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: Splashes

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Keep the cold air at bay while you celebrate your beloved California Splashes with this incredible Champ Drive Flash Hybrid full-zip jacket from Splashes!
